Some Lesser Known Facts About Puja Kameshwar Sharma

Does Puja Kameshwar Sharma smoke?: No

Does Puja Kameshwar Sharma drink alcohol?: No

Puja Kameshwar Sharma was born and brought up in Jharkhand.

She is an Indian TV actress who appeared in the TV serials like ‘Gangaa’, ‘Mere Angne Mein’, ‘Naagin’ etc.

She was interested in acting since the age of 5.

She started her acting career in 2005.

Before becoming an actress, she worked as a crew member in Ex-Jet Airways.

She also worked in many Tamil ads.

She assumes Aashish Kaul as her mentor.
